EmailTemplate.description: Email to Josh to request RCell for ICD Cases
EmailTemplate.name: ICD - RCELL Request
EmailTemplate.subject: ICD - RCell Request - {!Case.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Josh,
Please see customer's details requiring an RCell due to no internet connection/use of wireless/mobile internet.
Name: Lease #: Phone #: Home Address: Address ID:
Assigning Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} to you.
Regards,
